name: OOOOH MAN RUNNING AGAIN...
description:
OOOOH MAN RUNNING AGAIN...

Aside some technical demos and smaller side projects, currently only game that was released is OOOOH MAN RUNNING AGAIN.... It is my first finished game that has 2d pixel art, audio and full user interface. It is side runner with randomly generated platforms.

 Run as long as you can to get more and more points! Be aware, speed will only increase!

Feel free to comment and give feedback about what is cool and what is bad in the game, I want to improve my skills ;)

Creadits
  • Athor: Adam Malewski
  • Art: https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack - Jesse M - https://twitter.com/Jsf23Art
New project soon!
